1.0.0.en: First version. Added some useful sensors and flows.

1.0.2.en: Check the wired clients while counting.

1.0.4.en: Deleted nodejs forge module and used standart nodejs crypto for better memory usage.

1.0.6.en: Changed API requests for better memory usage.

1.0.7.en: Bugfix on wireless client count and API optimizations.
